string-array.name: card_ironclad_desc
string-array.item: Deal 6 damage. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.
Gain 5 Block. Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
Deal damage equal to your current Block.
Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14 damage.
Gain 2 Strength. At the end of the turn, lose 2 Strength.
Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.
Deal 9 damage. Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
Deal 14 damage. Strength affects Heavy Blade 3 times.
Deal 6 damage. Deals an additional 2 damage for ALL of your cards containing \"Strike\".
Deal 3 damage to random enemy 3 times.
Deal 4 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Gain 7 Block. Exhaust a random card from your hand.
Draw 1 card. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Deal 12 damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.
Draw 3 cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn.
Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose HP in combat. Deal 18 damage.
At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP and deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
Skills cost 0. Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.
Deal 5 damage. If the enemy is Vulnerable, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card.
Create a copy of an Attack or Power card in your hand.
Whenever you draw a Status, draw 1 card.
Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain 3 Block.
At the end of your turn, for each Attack played this turn deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 12 Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 damage to the attacker.
Add a random Attack to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.
At the end of your turn, gain 3 Block.
Add 2 Wounds to your hand. Gain 15 Block.
Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 3 Block.
Deal 8 damage. Every time this card is played, increase its damage by 5 for this combat.
Deal 7 damage. Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain 1 Strength.
Deal 12 damage. Can be upgraded any number of times.
Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand and gain 5 Block for each.
Gain 5 Block. If this card is Exhausted, gain 2 energy.
Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Deal 16 damage.
Apply 3(5) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.\n Exhaust.
If an enemy intends to attack, gain 3 Strength.
Deal 13 damage. Apply 1 Weak. Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies X times.
Block no longer expires at the start of your turn.
Gain 3 Vulnerable. Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn.
Whenever a card is Exhausted, draw 1 card.
At the start of each turn, gain 2 Strength.
This turn, your next Attack is played twice.
Place a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Deal 10 damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain 3 permanent Max HP. Exhaust.
Exhaust your hand. Deal 7(10) damage for each Exhausted card. Exhaust.
Deal 21 damage to ALL enemies. Add a Burn to your discard pile.
Whenever you gain Block, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
Lose 6 HP. Gain 2 energy. Draw 3 cards. Exhaust.
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies. Heal for unblocked damage dealt. Exhaust.
